sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SCHAEFFERA, in botany: A genus of the tetrandria order, belonging to the dioecia claſs of plants; and in the natural method ranking with thoſe that are doubtful. The calyx is quadripetalous; the corolla is quadripetalous, quinquepetalous, and often wanting; the fruit is a bilocular berry with one feed. Of this there are two ſpecies, both natives of Jamaica; and grow in the lowlands near the ſea: viz. 1. The Completa. 2. Lateriflora.
